verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Achab \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w eighteenth|strong="H6240"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Josaphat \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H7535"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*: \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* statues \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.

Nevertheless \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w stuck|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sins|strong="H2398"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nabat, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H0834"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* Mesa, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, nourished many \w sheep|strong="H5349"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w paid|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w* \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* fleeces.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* Achab \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w dead|strong="H4194"\w*, \w he|strong="H0256"\w* broke \w the|strong="H1961"\w* league which \w he|strong="H0256"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w mustered|strong="H6485"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Josaphat \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w revolted|strong="H6586"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*. \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*: \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* mine, \w is|strong="H4428"\w* thine: \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, thy \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1870"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Which|strong="H2088"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* we \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*? \w But|strong="H1870"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w By|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w went|strong="H5437"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* fetched \w a|strong="H1961"\w* compass \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w daysâ€™|strong="H3117"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w followed|strong="H7272"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Alas|strong="H0162"\w*, \w alas|strong="H0162"\w*, \w alas|strong="H0162"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w gathered|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* together, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*!

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Josaphat \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Is|strong="H0369"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* beseech \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*? \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Here|strong="H6311"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* Eliseus \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Saphat, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elias.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Josaphat \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Josaphat \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Eliseus \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* thee? go \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* hath \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3588"\w* together \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Eliseus \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* liveth, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* reverence \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Josaphat \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* hearkened \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w nor|strong="H0518"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* thee.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* hither \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w minstrel|strong="H5059"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w minstrel|strong="H5059"\w* \w played|strong="H5059"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* said:

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* channel \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* torrent full \w of|strong="H3068"\w* ditches.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w small|strong="H7043"\w* \w thing|strong="H7043"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: moreover \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w pass|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H4503"\w* \w used|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w*, \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w were|strong="H4605"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w gathered|strong="H3588"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H4605"\w* \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* belt \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1242"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w rose|strong="H7925"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* being now \w up|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H1242"\w* shining \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w red|strong="H0122"\w*, \w like|strong="H1818"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*,
